title: MD
biography: The Medical University of Warsaw is one of the oldest and the largest medical schools in Poland. The first academic department of medicine was established as far back as two centuries ago in 1809. It is considered to be one of the most prestigious and reputable schools nationally for the medical sciences, partly due to its affiliation with a number of large hospitals in Poland.
aiSummary: Mirosław WielgośMedical University of Warsaw is a national science award specialist with an H-index of 2 at Obstetrics (Member). Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
